diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: sarcoma, benign lymphoid infiltrate, Castleman's disease, myocarditis, pericarditis, sarcoidosis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Initial investigations indicated a soft tissue mass at the base of the heart, leading to a concern for malignancy. Biopsy and subsequent studies ruled out several conditions, including sarcoma and other malignant processes, ultimately identifying this as low-grade lymphoma after gene-rearrangement studies.
